FAQ: Wpisy związane z najczęściej zadawanymi pytaniami i innymi informacjami
JPEGThumbnails: meguca uses WebP thumbnails by default. Enable this, if you want to support older browsers, Safari or Apple devices at the expense of no thumbnail transparency.
NSFW: Board allows material, that are not safe to be viewed in a work environment
alwaysLock: Lock scrolling to page bottom even when tab is hidden
audioVolume: Volume of audio in music and video players
bgVideo: Admin-specified memes piped straight into you're monitor
boardExpiry: Liczba dni, po których dział bez odpowiedzi zostanie usunięty
boardName: Nazwa nowego działu. Może zawierać do 10 małych liter łacińskich i liczb.
boardTitle: Tytuł nowego działu, coś jak 'Animu & Mango'. Do 100 znaków.
captcha: Poproś użytkownika o wypełnienie captchy przy takich rzeczach jak rejestracja i tworzenie tematu
captchaTags: Tags to source for captcha solutions. One tag is randomly chosen for each generated captcha. Required to contain at least 3 different tags.
charScore: Antispam weight of modifying a character in a post. After exceeding the limit the user will need to solve a captcha.
customCSS: User-defined CSS rules loaded on top of the selected theme
defaultCSS: Domyślnie ładowany styl, jeśli użytkownik nie wybierze innego
disableRobots: Prevent automated website crawlers, such as search engine indexers, from accessing this board.
disableUserBoards: Prevents any account apart from the 'admin' account from creating new boards
eightball: Lista odpowiedzi komendy #8ball. Może zawierać maksymalnie 100 odpowiedzi i 2000 znaków.
expandAll: Expand all images. Webm, PDF and MP3 and your own post aren't affected. New post images are also expanded.
feedbackEmail: Mail kontaktowy znajdujący się na górze strony.
flags: Display poster country flags on posts
forcedAnon: Wyłącz nazwy użytkowników, tripkody i maile w postach
globalDisableRobots: Prevent automated website crawlers, such as search engine indexers, from accessing this website.
hideBinned: Hide all posts that have been deleted
hideNSFW: Hide boards tagged as not safe for work from the /all/ metaboard
hideRecursively: Hide all posts, that replied to a hidden post recursively
hideThumbs: Display a [Show] button in place of thumbnails
horizontalNowPlaying: Display now playing banners inline rather than stacked
imageRootOverride: If you wish to host images from a separate location like a CDN, enter the full root address here. Leave empty to use the default address. Example: 'https://images.meguca.org'
imageScore: Antispam weight of posting an image. After exceeding the limit the user will need to solve a captcha.
inlineFit: Expand images inside the parent post and resize according to setting
janitors: Janitor account IDs. Janitors can only delete posts.
links: Dodaj, usuń lub edytuj linki zewnętrzne w stylu >>>/4chana/
mascotImage: Image to use as the mascot
mature: Przy pierwszej wizycie poinformuj użytkownika o treściach dla dorosłych na tej stronie
maxSize: Maksymalny rozmiar wrzucanego obrazka wyrażony w megabajatch
meguTV: Play random board-specific videos in overlay player
meguTVShortcut: Play random board-specific videos in overlay player
moderators: Moderator account IDs. Moderators can delete posts, ban posters and distinguish posters by their mnemonic IDs.
name: Login
Imię, które będzie używane przy nowych postach
notice: Krótka informacja pokazywana na górze strony
notification: Get desktop notifications when quoted or a syncwatch is about to start
overrideCaptchaTags: Mapping of boards to tags to use as the solution on the specified board.
owners: Owner account IDs. Board owners have full access to all board controls. Must contain at least one.
postCreationScore: Antispam weight of creating a new post. After exceeding the limit the user will need to solve a captcha.
postInlineExpand: Inline linked post under the post link on click. When disabled, navigates to the linked post instead.
pruneBoards: Usuń działy bez żadnych postów od N dni
pruneThreads: Usuń tematy bez żadnych postów od N dni
rbText: Display red and blue text if formatted with '^r' or '^b'
relativeTime: Relative post timestamps. Ex.: '1 hour ago'
replyRight: Move Reply button to the right side of the page
rootURL: Root URL of the imageboard. Required for some image search providers to work.
rules: Zasady działu pokazywane w oknie zasad
sage: Do not bump the thread to the top of the board on post creation.
salt: Sól zabezpieczająca tripkody. Najlepiej, żeby miała co najmniej 40 znaki.
sessionExpiry: Czas w dniach, po jakim konta są automatycznie wylogowywane
staffTitle: Display your staff title in the post header
threadExpiryMax: Number of days without new posts before a thread is deleted
threadExpiryMin: Number of days without new posts before a thread is deleted
title: Nazwa działu
Krótka, opisowa nazwa działu
toggleSpoiler: Toggle spoiler in the open post
userBGImage: Image to use as the background
watchThreadsOnReply: Automatically add thread to watched threads on reply
webmHover: Display WebM previews on hover. Requires Image Hover Expansion enabled.
workMode: Hides images and disables user background
workModeToggle: Hides images and disables user background

banPage: You have been banned from /%s/ by %s for the following reason:
Your ban will expire on %s or in %s.
According to our server, your IP is %s.

ui.bannerSpecs: Accepts up to 20 JPEG, PNG, GIF or WEBM files with maximum dimensions of 300x100, maximum file size of 100 KB and no sound.
ui.charCount: Amount of characters in the post body
ui.loadingSpecs: Accepts a GIF or WEBM file with maximum dimensions of 300x300, maximum file size of 100 KB and no sound.
ui.searchTooltip: Filter threads by subject, body or board name encased in backslashes. Accepts Regular expressions.
ui.subject: Temat
